title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
EB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row should be deleted. The second row should remain, and the Launch item should stay on the second row.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Press the Delete button.
2. Notice that the first item on the second row is deleted.
3. Also notice that the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
